reviews.text: Contrary to all the negative reviews, I want to note that I regularly refuel here on different days and at different times. There were never any problems. The service is quite adequate. Today I had farm burgers. The service is very pleasant, everything was done quickly and deliciously. Thank you for the service

Good afternoon, I witnessed an unpleasant situation that outraged and disappointed. Unfortunately, I only saw the end of the situation, but this is enough to draw conclusions. The blonde lady, who was making burgers, shouted at the top of her voice to the soldier, who just wanted to make himself a coffee. As it turned out, the device ran out of milk. So is it the fault of the military? ! Yes, maybe he didn't understand that it was over! Maybe he is tired and wants to go home to his relatives as soon as possible?! How can you be a member of the "Return Alive" fund, and at the same time treat the servicemen themselves with such disrespect?! We should be grateful and thank them every day that thanks to them, we can make burgers, work and wake up early. It's a shame!

Every time I stop by in the morning to refuel I am offered a burger, hot dog, coffee and something else. I don't need your coffee, burgers, I'm in a hurry to get to work and your offers are inappropriate. If I need it, I will gladly take it. I need you to serve Me faster, and not to mumble under your breath at a fast pace.
This morning there was a very unpleasant situation that annoyed me for the whole day. I ordered 2 hotdogs, I waited at least 15 minutes for them!!!!!!!!! In the morning, it is simply unacceptable to spend so much time on cooking.
WHY DO I HAVE TO WAIT SO MUCH TIME FOR YOU TO MAKE ME SOME HOT DOG???
Besides, As soon as they made me a hot dog, some guy came up and took it away!? How can it be?
I started arguing because the seller didn't tell me it was mine!! (but he redid it for me, for which, I thank him.)
Make queue numbers and let people show that it is theirs, and not just come and take.

1. There is no need to offer something to the cashiers so that I order. If I need it, I will order it myself. First, you must listen to Me, what I need.
The poor cashiers say the same thing to every customer, how do you think they'll feel after the day!?
2. Put 2 people in the morning to cook, if necessary, 1 can't do it. As I saw it in the morning.
3. I will no longer order anything from you, you refuel galima, as you can see from the comments below, and from my experience how much I refueled. and it's not only here.

Sorry, but that's not a gas station, that's a roadside hot dog stand. There was a 20-minute wait for cashiers to feed people hotdogs. The staff, unfortunately, are unpleasant to communicate with, in the end they still threw a claim at me, and why did I stand in line, I had to go to self-service.
Instead of a greeting, they were just rude, the impression is that they don't provide gas station services here, but just pour dirt on them. Can you just shut up with such an attitude?
